statements: DELETE FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 1;
DELETE FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND blood_pressure = 'High';
DELETE FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 123 AND heart_rate < 60;
DELETE FROM patient_vital_signs WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '120/%' AND temperature > 98.6;
DELETE FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 100 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00'
DELETE FROM AlertLogs WHERE alert_id = 500
DELETE FROM AlertLogs WHERE patient_id = 123 AND alert_type = 'Critical';
DELETE FROM PatientVitalSigns WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND vital_sign_value > 100;
DELETE FROM vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 101;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 5;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 101;
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
DELETE FROM vital_signs WHERE patient_id = 1 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 2;
DELETE FROM VitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Alerts WHERE patient_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age >= 60 AND gender = 'female';
DELETE FROM VitalSigns WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE age < 30);
